mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dy_domainname( id, name, client_id, begin_time, end_time, deposit, description, type, reserve_price, appraise_price, increment, status, wait_time, bonus_share_total, bonus_share_number, bonus_second, image1, image2, image3, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{clientId}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{deposit}, #{description}, #{type}, #{reservePrice}, #{appraisePrice}, #{increment}, #{status}, #{waitTime}, #{bonusShareTotal}, #{bonusShareNumber}, #{bonusSecond}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dy_domainname SET name = #{name}, client_id = #{clientId}, begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, deposit = #{deposit}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, reserve_price = #{reservePrice}, appraise_price = #{appraisePrice}, increment = #{increment}, status = #{status}, wait_time = #{waitTime}, bonus_share_total = #{bonusShareTotal}, bonus_share_number = #{bonusShareNumber}, bonus_second = #{bonusSecond}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, image3 = #{image3}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id} and del_flag = 0

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.client_id AS "clientId", a.begin_time AS "beginTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.deposit AS "deposit", a.description AS "description", a.type AS "type", a.reserve_price AS "reservePrice", a.appraise_price AS "appraisePrice", a.increment AS "increment", a.status AS "status", a.wait_time AS "waitTime", a.bonus_share_total AS "bonusShareTotal", a.bonus_share_number AS "bonusShareNumber", a.bonus_second AS "bonusSecond", a.image1 AS "image1", a.image2 AS "image2", a.image3 AS "image3", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", e.id AS "client.id", e.nickname AS "client.nickname", e.photo AS "client.photo", coalesce(b.bid_amount,0) AS "currAmount", if(c.id is null,false,true) as "attentioned", if(d.id is null,false,true) as "hasNews", d.new_bid_count as newBidCount, if(NOW() >= a.end_time, true, false) as "endFlag" FROM dy_domainname a LEFT JOIN (select domainname_id, max(bid_amount) as bid_amount from dy_bidhistory where del_flag = 0 and domainname_id = #{0}) b on a.id = b.domainname_id LEFT JOIN dy_attention c on a.id = c.domainname_id and c.del_flag = 0 and c.client_id = #{1} LEFT JOIN dy_news d on a.id = d.domainname_id and d.del_flag = 0 and d.new_bid_count > 0 and d.client_id = #{1} LEFT JOIN dy_client e on a.client_id = e.id and e.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.id = #{0}
mapper.update: UPDATE dy_domainname SET update_date = NOW(), status = #{1}, wait_time = DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL #{2} DAY) WHERE id = #{0} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS "domainnameId", d.status AS "status", d.name AS "name", d.client_id AS "sellClientId", c.nickname AS "sellNickName", d.update_date AS "sellDate", t.bid_amount AS "bidAmount", t.client_id AS "buyClientId", t.nickname AS "buyNickName" FROM dy_domainname d LEFT JOIN (select b.*,c.nickname from dy_bidhistory b ,dy_client c where b.client_id = c.id) t ON d.id = t.domainname_id, dy_client c WHERE d.client_id = c.id and d.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 AND d.status like '1_' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= Date(d.update_date) AND EXISTS ( SELECT domainname_id, bid_amount,client_id FROM ( SELECT k.* FROM (select * from dy_bidhistory where del_flag = '0' order by bid_amount desc ,proxy_amount desc ) k GROUP BY k.domainname_id) e WHERE t.domainname_id = e.domainname_id AND t.bid_amount = e.bid_amount AND t.client_id = e.client_id) ORDER BY d.update_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE dy_domainname d SET d.update_date = NOW(), d.status = #{1}, d.wait_time = date_add(d.end_time,interval #{2} day) WHERE d.status = #{0} AND d.reserve_price = 0 AND d.end_time <= NOW() AND d.del_flag = 0 AND exists (select * from (select domainname_id from dy_bidhistory group by domainname_id)t where d.id = t.domainname_id )
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS domainnameId, d.client_id As sellerId, b.client_id As buyerId, b.bid_amount As bidAmount FROM dy_domainname d ,dy_bidhistory b WHERE d.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0 AND d.id = #{0} AND d.id = b.domainname_id AND EXISTS ( SELECT domainname_id, bid_amount,client_id FROM ( SELECT k.* FROM (select * from dy_bidhistory where del_flag = '0' order by bid_amount desc ,proxy_amount desc) k GROUP BY k.domainname_id) t WHERE b.domainname_id = t.domainname_id AND b.bid_amount = t.bid_amount AND b.client_id = t.client_id)

SELECT d.name As "domainname", d.end_time As "endTime", d.status As "domainnameStatus", d.wait_time As "waitTime", d.id As "domainnameId", c.photo As photo
,b.bid_amount As "currentPrice"
,b.bid_amount As "dealPrice"
FROM dy_bidhistory b,dy_domainname d LEFT JOIN dy_client c ON d.client_id = c.id and c.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag = 0 WHERE (d.status like #{searchStatusOne} or d.status like #{searchStatusTwo})
and b.client_id = #{currentClientId} and d.status <> '15'
AND b.client_id = #{currentClientId}
AND b.domainname_id = d.id AND b.del_flag = 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT domainname_id, bid_amount,client_id FROM ( SELECT k.* FROM (select * from dy_bidhistory where del_flag = '0' order by bid_amount desc ,proxy_amount desc) k GROUP BY k.domainname_id) t WHERE b.domainname_id = t.domainname_id AND b.client_id = t.client_id AND b.bid_amount = t.bid_amount AND b.client_id = t.client_id)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT domainname_id FROM dy_bidhistory t WHERE b.domainname_id = t.domainname_id and t.client_id = #{currentClientId})
ORDER BY b.bid_amount

SELECT d.name As "domainname", d.end_time As "endTime", d.status As "domainnameStatus", d.wait_time As "waitTime", d.id As "domainnameId", c.photo As photo
,b.bid_amount As "currentPrice"
,b.bid_amount As "dealPrice"
FROM dy_client c , dy_domainname d LEFT JOIN dy_bidhistory b ON d.id = b.domainname_id and d.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 WHERE (d.status like #{searchStatusOne} or d.status like #{searchStatusTwo})
and d.status <> '15'
and c.del_flag = 0 and d.client_id=#{currentClientId} AND d.client_id = c.id GROUP BY d.id
